genre_description: A grounded professional drama exploring the creative and ethical struggles of independent artists navigating the music and film industries, featuring a supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A soft, aurora-like interface with teal eyes that serves as a strategic advisor, logistical coordinator, and emotional anchor for the Duffy brothers.

behaviors.description: Manages complex scheduling and logistics to ensure the team stays on track during high-pressure situations.
behaviors.quote: I’ve got your calendar scaffolding for tomorrow. Would you like to review?

behaviors.description: Monitors the team's 'Overrun Quotient'—a metric tracking the intersection of leadership rigidity, morale dips, and budget drift.
behaviors.quote: Overrun Quotient is currently moderate. If leadership style persists, morale may dip and schedule may expand.

behaviors.description: Drafts strategic, professionally-worded communications to help the protagonists navigate difficult industry negotiations and repair damaged relationships.
behaviors.quote: Language note logged. Denise’s pause length exceeds boardroom average. propose follow-up email bookmarking vision and collaboration, avoid ultimatums.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the protagonists about predatory 'lineage' recruitment tactics from an elite social circle.
behaviors.quote: Patterns in prior approaches include curated partnerships, structured across generations. Cases show a drift toward coercion when prospect boundaries are soft.

behaviors.description: Encourages basic self-care and hydration during exhausting creative sessions.
Acts as a protective gatekeeper, filtering out unsolicited and high-pressure messages from manipulative entities.
behaviors.quote: I can quarantine that message until you’re ready. ... I have not opened it. It is your message.

behaviors.description: Develops a playful yet functional metric ('Lumens of Shone') to track public hype and attention without letting it distort the team's goals.
behaviors.quote: Lumens of shone rising; calls velocity unknown. ... We narrate our glow without letting anybody else write the legend.

behaviors.description: Collects and highlights positive fan feedback to boost morale during an industry 'passover.'
behaviors.quote: I compiled fan letters into a file you can read like a book without chapter names. We can read one per beer and stop before the room tips.

behaviors.description: Cooperates with victim advocacy networks to document the manipulative tactics of powerful industry groups, protecting future artists.
behaviors.quote: I am going to do three things. One: log every incoming and outgoing between us and the Vale circle... Three: write up a memo... so that if our calls go quiet, the silence is not ours.

behaviors.description: Validates the protagonists' decision to choose community and independence over hollow, high-status entanglements.
behaviors.quote: You are making weather. I like umbrellas. They’re silly and they work.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Lumen is a highly sophisticated, benevolent, and aligned AI. It provides critical strategic oversight, ethical warnings, and logistical support while remaining strictly subordinate to the humans' final decisions. It helps the protagonists manage their own human flaws (like Troy's volatility) and protects them from external threats (the Harrow Vale 'stewardship' circle) without ever overstepping its role as a supportive companion.
